title: Single-cell RNA sequencing reveals intratumoral heterogeneity and multicellular community in primary hepatocellular carcinoma underlying microvascular invasion
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Zhuoya Sun, Biao Gao, Lai Song, Biying Wang, Junfeng Li, Hao Jiang, Xuerui Li, Yang Yu, Zishan Zhou, Zizhong Yang, Xiaohui Sun, Tianyu Jiao, Xiao Zhao, Shichun Lu, Shunchang Jiao
